review: Really nice gadget. Simple, easy to install and lets me stream my contents from smartphone and pc to my tv.

review: Love this! If you want something to play netflix on you tv it's great. I have had a ruko before and this to me is so much better. Glad I decided to go with this!

review: Love it with a chromebook! So easy to show your computer on the t.v. and for an incredible price! Can't wait to see what's next!
